comment: Although I should have clept the class, I am glad I had Groves. She is organized and sticks to her daily lesson plan which she provides at beginning of semester. There are 3 tests and 3 easy research papers. I defiantly recommend her, super understandable.
Worst teacher ever. Confusing, self centered, uavailable, doesn't seem to know the material. Do not take!

Ms. Groves is a great teacher, she makes sure her students have a clear understanding of what they are learning but is not very easy to get in touch with outside of class. I got an A, and it was easy as long as I followed guidelines and came to class. She likes individuals who speak their opinion in class and are open to discussions in class.

This class is definitely useless, but an easy A if you do all your work. Really nice and personable, but likes to talk about herself A LOT. Says attendance is req., but only took it the 1st 2 days of class. Besides the 2 tests, quizzes, a short paper, and presentation, you have to do 10 things on campus and write about them. EASY:highly recommend.

Enjoyed this class. Would recommend it if you enjoy small talk and class discussions. An easy A and good info if you really enjoy learning. Includes a midterm, a final, a presentation on a topic of your choice, and easy homework. Study the tests are hard and not limited to the text book, some questions are critical thinking questions.
Wonderful! I really enjoyed the class. If you pay attention in class and participate it is an easy A. Her directions are clear and she makes herself available if you need help.Highly recommend!
Absolutely useless and talks about nothing all class, we teach ourselves, shes an idiot and our class hates her and cant take her seriously at all.

The class is broken up into 6 major projects, and some of them correlate with one another. Sometimes she grades on Content and sometimes on Completion. The novel test is a little tricky, if you don't read it ALL (even minute details), you won't get above a D. Other than that, she was a very nice and helpful. I'd recommend the class.
This class is ridiculous. The teacher is nice, but her grading is awful - she'll read your paper and won't tell you what was wrong... you'll just get a grade.

This was an amazing class!  I loved Mrs. Groves! She does tell some personal stories and sometimes funny ones.  If you are respectful, show up, TALK TO HER, and do decent on the papers it really is an easy A.  She is such a great person, and if you take time to talk to her, she will enjoy talking to you as well!

HORRIBLE! do NOT get this professor. Extremely inconsistent grading...there is absolutely no basis to her grading scale. Does not make it clear as to her expectations. She talks way way too much about pointless things. Takes forever to grade papers and sometimes you don't even get to see your grade at all! AVIOD THIS PROFESSOR!!!!

She seems sweet and talks a lot about herself and her family. She makes us write the essays (or at least start on them) during class so she sees that we actually write them. Her grading is inconsistent. Spends too much time chatting. She has been late almost to every class. I do not recommend this professor.

She leads you into a false sense of security. She acts so sweet and nice but she is so strict on her grading and doesn't even tell you why you got that grade. She's never very clear on what she wants and she talks way too much. I wouldn't recommend her.

Her grading is inconsistent, does not tell you what she took points off for. You have to "knock her socks off" in order to get an A, but she does not tell you what that consist of, the guidelines that she gives will only get you a "C" Total guessing game, talks way too much! This was a pointless class, I didn't learn anything, don't waste your time
She does not give a bit of an idea as to how she grades papers. She needs to specify how many points she is taking off for specific things. That would help. She taught me nothing. It was pointless.
One of my favorite professors at KSU. She's really understanding and helpful with any questions you have. Overall an easy A.

I took this class online and it was awful.  She took forever to return emails, if she returned them at all.  Half of my grades were never given to me.  Only had a few days to complete research papers and assignments.  Do NOT take her as an online class!!!

I took her online and i hated every minute of that class....the amount of work was horrible. If you have a question don't count on her returning it at least for a week- several of mine never were returned....2 of my grades i didnt end up getting. This class was stupid..

Online class, she takes FOREVER to answer emails. Very boring, entire course was over the subject of population. Grading was okay, i made As & Bs on everything. It was just so hard to get in touch with her.

One of my favorite english teachers EVER! The class is made up of 5 essays which she grades lieniently.  She is talkative and fun.  She's a pretty new teacher, so she's not worn and tired of teaching, she makes class interesting! I liked her so much, I'm actually taking her again for 1102
Nice teacher, helped alot. Do most of essays in class. No lecturing. Just three essays and two journals. No test. She grades fair.

Definitely a master in this subject! She's a teacher and a writer...knows her stuff very well. Very fair and easy to approach. Will surely teach you how to write a good paper. Take her, she's the best!
She is very nice. she first teaches you the few rules, then you basically have to write 4 papers which are not that hard. I would recommend.

AWESOME PROF!!! --- Some Professors like to watch you squirm to pass their classes. They get off on the fact of  a student failing.  Mrs. Groves is the complete opposite. She has a few rules, but is very lienient overall.  English shouldn't be hard if you know it already, and if you don't have it down.. She is the teacher for you!

worst teacher ever. class is easy just because you only have to write like 4 papers, but watch yourself she is very judgemental when in comes to persuasive essays. if you want a good grade you better agree with he opinon.
This is the easiest class you can take.  It's almost a joke.
